import React from "react"; import { useCart } from "react-use-cart"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import startersData from "./Data"; import { loadStripe } from "@stripe/stripe-js"; import axios from 'axios'; import { Component } from "react"; import getCommonOptions from "./getCommonOptions"; import { useCallback } from "react"; function Cart(){ let [branches, setBranches]=useState(''); const fetchData=()=>{ fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8000/franchise/', getCommonOptions()).then(response=>response.json()) .then((data)=>{ setBranches(data); console.log(data); }).catch((err)=>{ console.log(err); }) } useEffect(()=>{ fetchData(); },[]) const { isEmpty, totalUniqueItems, updateItemQuantity, items, removeItem, totalItems, cartTotal, } = useCart(); const delivery=cartTotal+2.5; const VAT=parseFloat(delivery*0.05).toFixed(2); const totalAmount=parseFloat(delivery+VAT).toFixed(2); if(isEmpty) return

return(

)}

})}

Delivery Fee: {delivery}BD

Your Final Amount is: {totalAmount}BD

)} export default Cart;
